title: Thresh Mains OCE
body:
Hello Friends! This is a invitation to all passionate {{champion:412}} Players like myself. if you wish to join this club simply send me a message on my account : SinclairsVoice.

Always Remember A Flay A Day Keeps The Purifier Away!

replies.body: So do you all wait for One for All so you can actually play together?
